actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to shorten the term of members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System from 14 to 8 years.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to shorten the term of members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System from fourteen to eight years. Empowers the President to remove any member of such Board for cause.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to shorten the term of members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System from 14 to 8 years.
